name: Joy Reyes-Madamba
text: Exaclty, Miriam needs/needed the resources. What would she need to do in return?  It would be hard to separate BBM from FEM for the reason you mentioned, he is the executor of the Marcos estate, which means he's still holding (and most probably using!) the money they stole from the Filipinos. There's evidence that they have no plans of giving it back (e.g. US Supreme Court contempt ruling if I am correct) so no, I don't think anyone should separate BBM from the FEM issue.
